report.title: NPMS All Visits
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for adminstrators to view all data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN users u on u.id=csf.created_by_id AND u.deleted=false JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id AND p.deleted=false JOIN locations plot ON plot.id = csf.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id JOIN locations square ON square.id = plot.parent_id AND square.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) #order_by#

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

column.name: sample_1_id
column.sql: coalesce(case when (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0 then (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer ELSE NULL END,csf.id)

column.name: plot_name
column.sql: COALESCE( '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' || '', csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: case when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NOT NULL AND (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0) THEN 'Survey 2' when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NULL OR (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer = 0) THEN 'Survey 1' ELSE '' END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
